Articles.Content:
Hey here I am again, testing all functions in the API and trying to figure out how and when they work.

I managed to "save" an object 


namespace RandomizedSystems
{
    class customtestsave 
    {
        [Persistent]
        public int myval = 0;
    }
}

And using: "ConfigNode.CreateConfigFromObject(obj);"

It saves correctly as: 

        RandomizedSystems.customtestsave
        {
            myval = 3
        }

however when I try to load it: 

                    ConfigNode subnode = node.GetNode("RandomizedSystems.customtestsave");
                    Debug.Log(subnode);
                    customtestsave obj = ConfigNode.CreateObjectFromConfig<RandomizedSystems.customtestsave>(subnode);

The subnode is shown to be correct - but there is a warning saying "object RandomizedSystems.customtestsave" does not exist.. And an exception is thrown/the object is not created. From what class should I derive something so that it can be saved?
